commits.author: Stefan Daschek
commits.summary: Add styling for <kbd> tags in web themes.
commits.body: The styling is very similar to how GitHub styles <kbd> tags (for dark themes it has been adapted accordingly).

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Switch to new scopes for embedded source.js

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Update scope for highlighting string embeds
commits.body: Switch to using meta.embedded for more complete matching.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Comment out fixed rules to prevent printing crash
commits.body: Having these in the CSS for some reason causes printing the webview to crash. Removal is hopefully temporary while the root cause can be narrowed down.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Only fixed the issue at hand in certain situations, pulled for a more complete solution. This reverts commit 547d9ea2d8647f1385673bff5f664f858b4c2536.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Using `position: fixed;` for these elements causes printing to crash even though they are hidden. Overriding their valid with `static` prevents this crash.

commits.author: Adam Strzelecki
commits.summary: Plain output theme: No need for separate print.css
commits.body:
Default print.css is just good enough, so we can get rid of the special one,
which makes top header to be printed.

commits.author: Adam Strzelecki
commits.summary: Plain web output theme matching system L&F
commits.body:
This theme is less intrusive than other bright themes and integrates well with
OS X Yosemite L&F. It uses system fonts for all output.

It is based on great Scott's theme:

  https://github.com/textmate/scott.tmbundle

NOTE: Theme switched stays invisible until it is hovered.
